article_title: Birth Control Supreme Court Case — ACLU
article_text:
Election 2016

Why This GOP Woman Is #NeverTrump

Katrina Jørgensen has spent years of her life working to promote the Republican Party and conservative causes. But this week, the 30-year-old quit a leadership post in one of the most prominent political organizations for young GOP voters. The reason? Donald Trump

Torey Van Oot

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Brigitte Amiri
article_metadata.description: Your birth control still isn't safe. The Supreme Court will soon consider a case that could make it easier for employers to avoid covering it.

og.description: Brigitte Amiri is a senior staff attorney for the ACLU Reproductive Freedom Project.  The Supreme Court is taking up a new case about contraception coverage. We’ll soon find out whether the highest court in the land believes that filling out a form to opt out of paying for contraception
